wikipedia_page.main: General Sir Roland Kelvin Guy  (25 June 1928 – 13 December 2005) was a senior British Army officer who was Adjutant-General to the Forces.

response: | General Sir Roland Guy || 26 May 1984 || 7 February 1987 ||
*General Sir Roland Guy, Adjutant General to the British Army 1984 to 1986
** 26 September – Roland Guy wins the men's national marathon title, clocking 2:24:48 in Sydney.
